meta.title: Echoes of the Ember King
meta.notes: Classic fantasy interactive fiction with dice. Abilities 0-30; total 120; skill thresholds at 10/20/25. This export includes hidden, skill-gated options in several scenes.

rules.check: total = d20 + floor(ability/5); success if total >= dc

scenes.title: Leaving the Village
scenes.description: Lanterns sway as villagers whisper about embers in the night sky. An old seer presses a coal-black charm into your hand.

success.narration: The seer reveals a path through murmuring trees and blesses your name.

failure.narration: The seer grows evasive; you depart with doubts gnawing.

success.narration: Glyphs bloom in your mind; the charm resonates with hidden wards.

failure.narration: The charm remains mute; soot stains your fingers.

scenes.background: Wind carries woodsmoke and damp earth; distant owls and whispering leaves make every footstep feel seen.

scenes.title: Barred by Iron and Ivy
scenes.description: A towering gate entangled in thorned ivy blocks the forest path; winds carry whispering voices.

success.narration: Iron groans; you heave the gate ajar and slip through.

failure.narration: The gate slams; a jolt shoots through your shoulder.

success.narration: Under ivy, a rune-pin clicks; a side passage yawns open.

failure.narration: You wander into brambles that tangle the way.

success.narration: Warmth spreads from the charm; the pain dulls.

failure.narration: The mantra falters; shadows press in.

success.narration: You slip through moments before roots twist shut.

failure.narration: Roots cinch; you wrestle free with scrapes.

scenes.title: Wounded Retreat
scenes.description: You stumble into a hollow beneath leaning pines; blood patters on old needles.
scenes.background: Wind carries woodsmoke and damp earth; distant owls and whispering leaves make every footstep feel seen. Resin-sweet air tries to steady your breath.

choices.option: Bind the cut and catch your breath

failure.narration: The wrap slips and stings, but you can move again.

choices.option: Steel yourself with a whispered vow

success.narration: Resolve cools the panic; the pain becomes background noise.

failure.narration: Your vow wavers; you rise anyway, teeth clenched.

scenes.title: Stone that Speaks
scenes.description: A face carved in granite whispers half-truths and riddles.

choices.option: Solve the riddle of ash and seed

success.narration: The stone exhales; a hidden route to the river is revealed.

failure.narration: Your answer echoes hollow; the forest tightens.

success.narration: The shrine softens; vines part in welcome.

failure.narration: The visage stills; silence disapproves.

choices.option: Trace the ley-lines only you see (Arcana)

success.narration: Ley-lines brighten beneath your touch; a safer path unfurls.

failure.narration: The lines flicker away; briars bite your ankles.

scenes.title: Current of Whispers

choices.option: Wade and brace against the current

failure.narration: The river tumbles you; you drag yourself to shore.

success.narration: You dance over spray; damp but triumphant.

failure.narration: A misstep dunks you; teeth chatter.

scenes.title: Ruined Watchtower
scenes.description: A collapsed tower overlooks crossroads; a beacon dish lies cracked.

choices.option: Signal potential allies with the dish

success.narration: A distant horn answers; traders will meet you.

failure.narration: Only crows reply; you move on alone.

scenes.title: Wind of Cinders
scenes.description: A gray valley chokes with ash; distant thunder is a volcano's heart.

success.narration: You grind forward, steps relentless.

failure.narration: You veer toward a half-buried ruin seeking shelter.

success.narration: You read the ash like ocean currents.

scenes.title: Glass Halls

success.narration: You map a non-Euclidean grid and keep your bearings.

failure.narration: Your marks twist; mirrors grin.

success.narration: You dash past luring doubles.

failure.narration: The key smears like oil; you recoil.

choices.option: Prepare the sealing rite from the scroll

failure.narration: A sigil misaligns; you will need strength to compensate.

scenes.title: Audience with the Ember King

success.narration: Steel rings; you drive the King to one knee.

success.narration: Words strike true; the King hesitates, listening.

failure.narration: He laughs like a furnace; your plea withers.

success.narration: Your vow bridges mortal and elemental law.
